mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.pid AS "prop.id", a.name AS "name", a.is_open AS "isOpen", a.params AS "params", a.pfomat AS "pfomat", a.instruction AS "instruction",
b.type AS "prop.type", b.title AS "prop.title", b.mica_panic AS "prop.micaPanic", b.on_off AS "prop.onOff"
LEFT JOIN sys_prop b ON b.id = a.pid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_prop_item( id, pid, name, is_open, params, pfomat, instruction ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{prop.id}, #{name}, #{isOpen}, #{params}, #{pfomat}, #{instruction} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_prop_item SET pid = #{prop.id}, name = #{name}, is_open = #{isOpen}, params = #{params}, pfomat = #{pfomat}, instruction = #{instruction} WHERE id = #{id}
